text: Spider-Man is a 1994 American animated series based on the Marvel Comics hero Spider-Man. It was created by Stan Lee and produced by Marvel Entertainment and Saban Entertainment. It stars Christopher Daniel Barnes, Saratoga Ballantine, Gary Imhoff, and Joseph Campanella. It ran from November 1994 to January 1998. The series was also produced by Marvel Films Animation, along with animation work by Tokyo Movie Shinsha (TMS). It is also known as Spider- Man: The Animated Series or Spider-Man TAS for short. ==Plot== One minute he's Peter Parker the college student, and the next he's Spider-Man. ==Cast== * Christopher Daniel Barnes – Peter Parker / Spider-Man * Jennifer Hale – Felicia Hardy / Black Cat * Saratoga Ballantine – Mary Jane Watson * Ed Asner – J. Jonah Jameson * Rodney Saulsberry – Joseph "Robbie" Robertson * Linda Gary / Julie Bennett – May Parker * Gary Imhoff – Harry Osborn / Green Goblin * Neil Ross – Norman Osborn / Green Goblin * Roscoe Lee Browne – Kingpin * Efrem Zimbalist Jr. – Doctor Octopus * Hank Azaria – Eddie Brock / Venom * Mark Hamill – Hobgoblin * Peter Mark Richman – Old Peter Parker / Spider-Man ==References== Category:1994 American television series debuts Category:1998 American television series endings Category:1990s American animated television series Category:English-language television programs
title: Spider-Man (1994 TV series)
